description: 2inn1 Kensington is flanked by the imposing slopes of Table Mountain and Lion's Head. It combines an authentically, stylishly remodeled Victorian house and a modern designed bungalow set in a beautiful tranquil garden. The pool area has sunbathed terraces offering magnificent views. The luxury rooms are equipped with every possible comfort.
name: 2Inn1 Kensington

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Outstanding service, the staff is just superb and helpfull, the rooms are very comfortable, good breakfast, very good decor. If I have to say a "negative aspect" I will only say location since it requires a taxi for almost everything.
reviews.title: A perfect Boutique Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: my boy-friend and me are both germans living in HK and have travelled many places in the world and believe that we have seen good and bad hotels more than we can count. 2inn1kensington simply blew us away. i have stayed at other hotels in cape town before and couldn't have dreamt about any better. klaus & christoph, the owners have newly designed and renovated this chraming villa(s) and turned it into a heaven-like place were all the staff make you feel very welcome and will exceeded our expectations by far. we were spoiled in any aspect: design, warmth, any questions, excellent food (a full 10 here!). there is wireless internet as well as a laptop for free usage. free happy hour drinks, the pool and jacuzzi are great and very clean as are the rooms. in the room we even found a cellphone for us to use, they simply have thought of everything. thanks to klaus & christoph we learned about extraordinary tours and had a remarkable time in cape town and surroundings. we will definitely come back and recommend this impressive place to our friends.
reviews.title: we were simply overwhelmed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled on business
reviews.text: I stayed at the 2inn1 primarily for business, so it was important that things "worked". I really got it right when I chose this hotel - the attention to detail was amazing. Not only was the setting beautiful understated, intimate and personal luxury but all the business functions were covered too...
reviews.title: You couldn't better care and attention to detail!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I was met with enthusiasm, already a local mobile phone had been arranged, there was wifi available that allowed me to work anywhere (inside and out) in the hotel.
reviews.title: Just Great!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: My room was quiet and every comfort had been thought of, from the private deck with an uninterrupted view of Table Mountain, to the idependently controlled underfloor heating in both the bedroom and bathroom.
reviews.title: Wonderful welcome, would return!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled on business
reviews.text: I stayed here for 5 nights during August. This was by far one of the best places I stayed in South Africa. What makes the difference is the attentiveness of the staff. They have considered almost everything that you may need in your rooms and can coordinate dinner reservations, trips and tours. Klaus was fantastic. I highly recommend this hotel for anybody visiting Cape Town. I will certainly stay here again when I return.
reviews.title: Fantastic!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 2inn1 Kensington stands out due to the high level of personal care and attention to detail from Klaus and his team.
reviews.title: Amazing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room had a wonderful view of Table mountain and the Lions Head. The breakfast was delicious and we very much appreciated the birthday cake the staff presented to us!
reviews.title: The rave reviews are right!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We would definitely stay here again next time in Cape Town.
reviews.title: Definitely the best hotel in Capetown by far for decor, location & service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We read a lot of TripAdvisor reviews and so had high expectations of 2Inn1 before we arrived. We stayed for 5 nights in mid-August, while sightseeing in Capetown and have to stay that the Inn exceeded even the glowing reviews posted here.
reviews.title: Outstanding

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010
reviews.text: We stayed 3 nights and loved it. The rooms are large and luxurious and well lit, with heated floors throughout. The common areas are chic and comfortable. Breakfast is plentiful, varied, and amazing. The staff are very helpful. Internet connectivity is great, with free wifi with good signal in your room and a communal laptop if you don't have your own device. They have a great relationship with Excite Taxis, which can be relied on and is always ready for you. Best thing, you get a pay as you go mobile to use while in town, with zero markup rates.
reviews.title: Luxurious and comfortable with outstanding service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010
reviews.text: I highly recommend this guesthouse.
reviews.title: Everything you read in the other reviews...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled solo
reviews.text: Everything you read in the other reviews is true. This is one of the best places I've stayed. Steffi, Claire and all the other staff are running a brilliant place. Great building, fantastic breakfast, perfect sundowners and beautiful location. Anything they could do better? Ditch the Celine Dion at breakfast!
reviews.title: You won't want to leave once you've stayed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A well positioned, peaceful, prestine, friendly 5 star service guesthouse.
reviews.title: Beautiful hotel with fantastic service.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed 3 days at the 2Inn1 Guesthouse and on arrival was greeted by Claire and Steffi who welcomed me with a well deserved drink on arrival. I was ushered to my room, & was soon well acquainted with the pool and jacuzzi area. On both evenings I sat on the veranda staring up at Table mountain and seeing the sun set. Breakfasts, were an absolute treat,and Victoria makes the most amazing omellete to set you up for the day.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel with beautiful views and excellent service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Everything has already been said - Klaus, Chris Steffi and their team combine efficiency, generous hospitality and superb attention to detail to create a haven of calm. At the end of a long day of sightseeing, albeit in one of the most spectacular parts of the world I have visited, returning to 2inn1 and being greeted with the words "I think you'd like a gin and tonic" was music to my ears! Another g&t later with the sun going down and Table Mountain right there - it was perfect. Keep up the good work - we will return!
reviews.title: Exceeded our high expectations!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just returned from an absolutely stunning 8 day break in Cape Town. I have used trip advisor extensively and the site has never let me down and although I always return home with the intention of submitting a review, well - like most of us, I never quite get around to it. This latest holiday is the exception for the simple reason that the 2Inn1 is really quite an outstanding home - it does really feel like home. Brilliant secluded location with incredible views of Lion's Head and Table Mountain, a friendly super efficient staff who have turned attention to detail into an art form - restaurants and taxis booked and always someone on hand to ensure arrangements actually work. Everything that I have read about the 2Inn1 is correct. Klaus, Chris and their team are up there with the very best.
reviews.title: A polished gem stone in South Africa

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We can’t speak highly enough of this hotel! Run by the friendliest managers, who offered the best customer service we’ve ever encountered to make our stay in Cape Town a success.
reviews.title: the friendliest staff who can't do enough to make your stay truly amazing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: They weren’t just involved with making us comfortable at the hotel itself, but booked trips and tickets for us, recommended places to visit and made dinner reservations at fantastic restaurants. They have the perfect blend of efficiency and friendliness so you know they’ll do what they’ve promised, but without the “stuffiness” you sometimes get in high quality hotels.
reviews.title: The best guest house in Capetown

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: By the time we left we felt like we’d make four new friends in the managers, and they send-off we got suggested they felt they were losing members of their own family! If we were to return to Cape Town we wouldn’t even look around, we’d book 2inn1 again immediately, and we've has even written a card of thanks to post to them there.
reviews.title: Exquisite place to stay in Cape Town
